com.shwy.bestjoy.contacts.backup.pim.vcard

类 VCardBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shwy.bestjoy.contacts.backup.pim.vcard.VCardBuilder

  • public class VCardBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

    The class which lets users create their own vCard String. Typical usage is as follows: 

    final VCardBuilder builder = new VCardBuilder(vcardType);
 builder.appendNameProperties(contentValuesListMap.get(StructuredName.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendNickNames(contentValuesListMap.get(Nickname.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendPhones(contentValuesListMap.get(Phone.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendEmails(contentValuesListMap.get(Email.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendPostals(contentValuesListMap.get(StructuredPostal.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendOrganizations(contentValuesListMap.get(Organization.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendWebsites(contentValuesListMap.get(Website.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendPhotos(contentValuesListMap.get(Photo.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendNotes(contentValuesListMap.get(Note.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendEvents(contentValuesListMap.get(Event.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendIms(contentValuesListMap.get(Im.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE))
     .appendRelation(contentValuesListMap.get(Relation.CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE));
 return builder.toString();

      VCardBuilder appendNameProperties(java.util.List<ContentValues> contentValuesList)
      For safety, we'll emit just one value around StructuredName, as external importers may get confused with multiple "N", "FN", etc. properties, though it is valid in vCard spec.

    • 方法详细资料

      • clear

        public void clear()

      • appendNameProperties

        public VCardBuilder appendNameProperties(java.util.List<ContentValues> contentValuesList)
        For safety, we'll emit just one value around StructuredName, as external importers may get confused with multiple "N", "FN", etc. properties, though it is valid in vCard spec.
